name: Venom Souls: Plants Revenge
description:
Fight with Maya in this hit and run game that requires strategy and will power. 

In a Pixel art world where oxygen is scarce and plants find their nutrients from computer motherboards and everything is dying the only reasonable way to survive seems to kill the plants themselves... isn't' it?

This game was developed by a team of four in ten days during the Zagarolo Game City Game Jam!
